evidence.claim: Lyn Health utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure, ensuring scalability and compliance.
The company mentions FHIR APIs for healthcare data interoperability.
Lyn Health processes X12 EDI transactions as part of their healthcare services.
They leverage AWS Lambda for serverless computing to manage events in real-time.

icp.icp_reason: Lyn Health utilizes X12 EDI standards and APIs for healthcare data exchanges, fitting ICP criteria.
